name: Missile Conflict Blitz
storyline: You are a commander and you have do protect your base from incoming missile attacks.
summary:
A classic arcade game reinvented! Take over command and fend incoming missiles. Defeat never ending attacks as long as you can and become a legendary commander.

Survive as many incoming attack waves as possible and complete your mission in several atmospheric environments with stunning graphics in unique ambiences. Protect your base long enough to finish the evacuation of your people and fend volleys of missiles one after another. Improve your tactics, upgrade your towers and use powerful special abilities to keep control over an intensive defense battle!

While building up your career and collecting commendations you can challenge friends or fight about highscores with players from all around the world. Connect your profile with GameCenter and play on your tablet and smartphone!
